messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Yoshitsune book help
messages.msgSnippet: Helen McCullough did a translation of a 15th century gunki called Gikeiki about Yoshitsune. The translation is called Yoshitsune. it has copious notes and
messages.messageBody:
Helen McCullough did a translation of a 15th century gunki called Gikeiki
about Yoshitsune. The translation is called Yoshitsune. it has copious notes
and background info. Its probably the best thing you can find in English.
however I think it might be out of print. You might try some of the used
books web sites like Addall.com or Alibris. I found a copy at Addall. Good
luck

messages.subject: Yoshitsune book help
messages.msgSnippet: Hi... I am Indonesian just starting to like Samurai, especially Yoshitsune. Anyone can help me to have a book/novel about him?
messages.messageBody:
Hi... I am Indonesian just starting to like Samurai,
especially Yoshitsune. Anyone can help me to have a
book/novel about him?
